cards.cardText: Before each of your turns, Bludger does 3 damage to your opponent if a match is in play. (If there isn't a Match in play, Bludger does no damage).
You win the current Match. (You get the prize.)
cards.flavorText: 'Harry had suddenly gone into a spectacular dive, which drew gasps and cheers from the crowd.'

cards.cardText: Your opponent discards his or her hand. Then he or she may draw any number of cards.
cards.flavorText: 'Professor Flitwick called them one by one into his class to see if they could make a pineapple tap-dance across a desk.'

cards.cardText: To play this card, discard 2 of your Care of Magical Creatures Lessons from play.
cards.flavorText: 'As the door creaked, low, rumbling growls met their ears. All three of the dog's noses sniffed madly in their direction...'

cards.cardText: You may use 1 Action (instead of 2) to put an Adventure card from your hand into play, even if you already have one in play. If you already had one in play, discard the old one. (Nobody gets the reward.)

cardText.effect: During your opponent's turns, prevent all damage done to you by Spell cards.
cardText.toSolve: Your opponent chooses 5 Spell cards in his or her hand and discards them.
cardText.reward: Your opponent gets 1 more Action (the turn this Adventure is solved).

cards.flavorText: 'Harry was so closed to the mirror now that his nose was nearly touching that of his reflection. 'Mum?' he whispered. 'Dad?''

cards.cardText: Before each of your turns, Bludger does 3 damage to your opponent if a match is in play. (If there isn't a Match in play, Bludger does no damage).
At the end of your opponent's turn, you win the game unless your opponent has at least 10 more cards in his or her deck than you do. (If he or she does, your opponent wins the game instead.)

cardText.effect: Your opponent gets 1 fewer Action on each of his or her turns (even the turn this Adventure is solved). (If this would mean your opponent has fewer than 1 Action, he or she still gets 1 Action.)

cards.cardText: Put up to 4 Creature cards from your discard pile into your hand.
cards.flavorText: 'A thousand live bats fluttered from the walls and ceilings while a thousand more swooped over the tables in low black clouds, making the candles in the pumpkins stutter.'

cards.cardText: Once during each of your turns, when you use an Action to play a Quidditch Lesson card, you may also draw a card.
cards.flavorText: 'Harry saw it. In a great rush of excitement he dived downwards after the streak of gold.'

cards.cardText: You may use an Action to search your deck. You may take a Healing card, show it to your opponent and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.
Once per game, you may search your deck. When you do, you may take a Broom card from your deck, show it to your opponent and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.
cards.flavorText: 'Their teacher, Madam Hooch, arrived. She had short, grey hair and yellow eyes like a hawk.'

cards.cardText: Once per game, you may make your opponent choose 3 cards in his or her hand and discard them. (If there are fewer than 3 cards in your opponent's hand, he or she discards them all.)
cards.flavorText: '... Slytherin captain Marcus Flint gains the Quaffle and off he goes â€” Flint flying like an eagle up there...' - Lee Jordan, Commentator

cards.cardText: You may prevent all but the first 8 damage done to you each turn.
cards.flavorText: 'Neville went bright red but turned in his seat to face Malfoy. 'I'm worth twelve of you, Malfoy,' he stammered.'

cards.cardText: Once per game, you may search your deck. When you do, you may take a Broom card from your deck, show it to your opponent and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.
Discard all Matches and Items that need Quidditch Power from play (even your own). (If a Match is discarded, no one gets the prize.)
Once per game, when 1 of your Spell cards that needs Quidditch Power does damage, you may have it do 8 more damage.
cards.flavorText: 'That Quidditch Cup'll have our name on it this year,' said Wood happily as they drudged back up to the castle.'

cards.cardText: Do 6 damage to your opponent. Then your opponent chooses 4 cards in his or her hand and discards them. (If there are fewer than 4 cards in your opponent's hand, he or she discards them all.)

Your opponent chooses 5 of his or her cards and discards them. Those cards can come from his or her hand or from play or from both. (If there are fewer than 5 total cards in your opponent's hand and in play, he or she discards them all.)
Once per game, you may discard the Adventure your opponent has played. (You don't get the reward.)
You may use 2 Actions to choose 1 of your opponent's cards in play (other than his or her starting Character) and return it to his or her hand.

cardText.toWin: Do 10 damage to your opponent while this card is in play. (That damage doesn't have to be done all at once.)
cardText.prize: The winner searches his or her deck. He or she may take up to 2 Lesson cards from his or her deck and put them into play. Then that player shuffles his or her deck.

cards.cardText: If Scabbers is discarded from play during your opponent's turn, put it into your hand.
cards.flavorText: 'The rat was still snoozing on Ron's lap. 'He might have died and you wouldn't know the difference,' said Ron in disgust.'

cards.cardText: Once during each of your turns, you may discard 2 cards from your hand to get 1 more Action.
cards.flavorText: ''Finnigan, Seamus', the sandy-haired boy next to Harry in the line, sat on the stool for almost a whole minute before the hat declared him a Gryffindor.'

cardText.toWin: Do 15 damage to your opponent while this card is in play. (That damage doesn't have to be done all at once.)
cardText.prize: The winner may shuffle up to 15 non-Healing cards from his or her discard pile into his or her deck.

cards.cardText: Put up to 4 Lesson cards from your discard pile into your hand.
At the end of your turn, draw a card if you played at least 1 Spell card that needs Quidditch Power that turn.
You may use 2 Actions to search your deck. You may take a Character card of a Character that isn't already in play and put it in play. Then shuffle your deck.
When you play this card, you may put a Lesson card from your discard pile into your hand. Whenever a Spell card damages you, you may let Trevor take that damage instead.
cards.flavorText: 'When they shook their heads, he wailed, 'I've lost him! He keeps getting away from me!'' - Neville Longbottom

cards.cardText: Search your deck. You may take a Wizard or a Witch card from your deck, show it to your opponent and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.
cards.flavorText: ''What are those?' Harry asked Ron, holding up a pack of Chocolate Frogs. 'They're not really frogs, are they?''

cards.cardText: Once during each of your opponent's turns, you may prevent 1 damage done to you. If you play this card, and you already have a Broom in play, discard the old one.
During your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage done to you.
To play this card, discard 1 of your Care of Magical Creatures Lessons from play. At the end of each of your turns, remove all damage counters from Devil's Snare.
cards.flavorText: 'As for Harry and Ron, their legs had already been bound tightly in long creepers without their noticing.'

cards.cardText: Choose 1 of your opponent's cards in play (other than his or her starting Character). Your opponent discards that card.
When you play this card, you may choose another Creature in play. Do 2 damage to it.

cardText.toWin: Do 8 damage to your opponent while this card is in play. (That damage doesn't have to be done all at once.)
cardText.prize: The winner may draw 5 cards. The loser takes 5 damage.

cards.flavorText: 'Up in the air, Snape turned on his broomstick just in time to see something scarlet shoot past him, missing him by inches...'

cardText.effect: Your opponent can't play Creature cards.
cardText.toSolve: Your opponent chooses 4 Creature cards in his or her hand and discards them.
cardText.reward: Your opponent may draw a card.

cards.flavorText: 'It took perhaps thirty seconds for Snape to realise that he was on fire.'

cardText.effect: Whenever 1 of your Creatures does damage to your opponent, it does 1 more damage.
cardText.toSolve: Your opponent skips a total of 5 Actions. (Those Actions don't need to be one right after the other.)
cardText.reward: Your opponent may draw a card.

cards.flavorText: 'They walked in silence, their eyes on the ground. Every now and then a ray of moonlight through the branches above lit a spot of silver blue blood on the fallen leaves.'

cards.cardText: Do 2 damage to your opponent. During your opponent's next turn, he or she can't play Spell cards.
Look at your opponent's hand. If there are any Spell cards there, choose 1 of them and discard it.
Draw 3 cards.

cardText.effect: The first Action your opponent uses on each of his or her turns must be used to draw a card.
cardText.toSolve: Your opponent shows you a card from his or her hand with a (printed) Power needed of 8 or more.

cards.flavorText: 'Don't want to pressure you, Potter, but if we ever need an early capture of the Snitch it's now.' - Oliver Wood

cards.cardText: Choose 1 of either player's Creatures in play and a Lesson card in that player's discard pile. Discard that Creature and put that Lesson card into play.
Play this card only if a Match is in play. Do 7 damage to your opponent.

cardText.effect: Your opponent discards the card he or she draws at the start of each of his or her turns.
cardText.toSolve: Your opponent discards his or her hand.

cards.flavorText: 'Harry was faster than Higgs - he could see the little round ball, wings fluttering, darting up ahead..'

cardText.effect: Your opponent can't use Actions to draw cards.
cardText.toSolve: Your opponent lets you search your deck for up to 2 cards and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.
cardText.reward: Your opponent may draw a card.

cards.flavorText: 'Ron didn't answer; Snape had just awarded Hufflepuff a penalty because George Weasley had hit a Bludger at him.'

cardText.effect: Before each of your turns, your opponent takes 4 damage.
cardText.toSolve: Your opponent discards his or her hand.
cardText.reward: Your opponent may put up to 4 non-Healing cards from his or her discard pile on the bottom of his or her deck (in any order).

cards.flavorText: 'He turned his broomstick sharply to face Malfoy in mid-air. Malfoy looked stunned.'

cards.cardText: You may put up to 3 Quidditch Lessons from your hand into play.
To play this card, discard 1 of your Potions Lessons from play. Do 5 damage to your opponent. During your opponent's next turn, prevent all damage done to you by your opponent's Creatures.
To play this card, discard 1 of your Potions Lessons from play. Do 4 damage to your opponent or to a Creature of your choice.
For the rest of this turn, your Spell cards need 5 less Power to play. (You still need at least 1 Power that matches.)
Shuffle up to 5 non-Healing cards from your discard pile into your deck.

When you play this card, look at the top 4 cards of your deck and put them back on top in any order. (If there are fewer than 4, look at all of them.) If you play this card, and you already have a Broom in play, discard the old one.
Do 4 damage to your opponent. Then, if your opponent has any cards in play, he or she chooses 1 of them and discards them.
At the end of each of your turns, remove all damage counters from Cobra Lily.
